flounder.particles

Class ParticleSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.particles.ParticleSystem

  • public class ParticleSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A system of particles that are to be spawned.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticleSystem

        public ParticleSystem(java.util.List<ParticleTemplate> types,
                      IParticleSpawn spawn,
                      float pps,
                      float speed,
                      float gravityEffect)
        Creates a new particle system.
        Parameters:
        types - The types of particles to spawn.
        spawn - The particle spawn types.
        pps - Particles per second.
        speed - The particle speed.
        gravityEffect - How much gravity will effect the particle.
